title: TraderStat
author: TraderStat
content: We are a team of traders, programmers and this is the TraderStat project. Our main activity is the analysis of signal providers in the currency and cryptocurrency markets.â‡ï¸ We have developed an algorithm, a system that checks all transactions of a provider for a certain period of time and gives the result in the form of several tables: general and summary. They display all the necessary data for the analysis of the provider.â—ï¸ We have already verified more than 90 forex market providers and also more than 180 crypto providers.
